name: MetacadeMax
description: $metacademax is a creator coin on the Zora platform (Base blockchain) tied to Metacade’s mascot, MAX. It’s part of Metacade’s Echosystem, a hybrid-token model where every meme, post, or cultural moment featuring MAX is monetized as a tradable ERC-20 token. The token captures attention and cultural energy from community engagement, converting it into economic value that echoes back to the parent token, $MCADE, to strengthen the Metacade ecosystem.
